thread.section_title: Omega Rental Cars Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Omega Rental Cars | omegarentalcars.com
thread.title: Lloyd Taylor
thread.title_full: Omega Rental Cars reviewed by Lloyd Taylor

author: Lloyd Taylor
title: Lloyd Taylor
text: We travel to NZ every 9-12mths as are always on a tight budget. We find Omega Rentals always have great deals going which we love to take advantage of. Staff are usually very attentive and pick ups from airport great or if flights in after hours, our car is easy to find in car park. Must admit though that parking price a bit steep when your plane doesn't get in until midnight. Just a small glitch. Cars always clean and ready to go. Never had any problems mechanically in any of our hires.
